overview.title: Isishwankathelo
overview.subtitle: Ukusebenza kokumaketha kanye nokuqonda ngaso sonke isikhathi
overview.description: Thola umbono ogcwele wezinyathelo zakho zokumaketha kuzo zonke iziteshi nemikhankaso.

email.title: Ukumaketha Nge-Email
email.subtitle: Dala, thumela, bese ulandele imikhankaso ye-email
email.description: Dizayina ama-email amahle, phatha izinhlu zababhalisile, bese uhlaziya ukusebenza komkhankaso.

ads.title: Ukuphathwa Kwezikhangiso
ads.subtitle: Phatha imikhankaso yakho yezikhangiso
ads.description: Dala bese uqinisa imikhankaso yezikhangiso kuma-platform amaningi bese ulandela i-ROI.

events.title: Imicimbi
events.subtitle: Hlela bese uphatha imicimbi yokumaketha
events.description: Hlela ama-webinar, imikhosi yezohwebo, neminye imicimbi yokumaketha ukuhlanganisa izethameli zakho.

buyer_intent.title: Inhloso Yomthengi
buyer_intent.subtitle: Khombisa abangaba abathengi abanezinhloso eziphakeme
buyer_intent.description: Landa izimpawu zokuthenga bese ubona abangaba abathengi abalungele ukuthenga.

lead_scoring.title: Ukubalwa Kwama-Lead
lead_scoring.subtitle: Bala bese ubeka phambili ama-lead ngokuzenzakalelayo
lead_scoring.description: Sebenzisa idatha yokuziphatha kanye nokubalwa kwabantu ukubala nokuhlela ama-lead akho ngokuzenzakalelayo.

journeys.title: Izihambo
journeys.subtitle: Dizayina imisebenzi yohambo lwamakhasimende
journeys.description: Dala imisebenzi yokumaketha ezenzakalelayo ukondla ama-lead ngaphakathi kwe-funnel yokuthengisa.

forecasting.title: Ukubikezela
forecasting.subtitle: Bikezela ukusebenza kokumaketha
forecasting.description: Sebenzisa ukubikezela okusekelwe ku-AI ukubikezela imiphumela yomkhankaso bese uqinisa izabelo.

meetings.title: I-Scheduler Yemihlangano
meetings.subtitle: Hlela imihlangano nabangaba abathengi
meetings.description: Vumela abangaba abathengi ukuthi baqophe imihlangano ngqo bese uyivumelanisa nekhaleda yakho.

analytics.title: I-Analytics
analytics.subtitle: I-analytics yokumaketha kanye nokubika
analytics.description: Landa izilinganiso zokusebenza, khipha imibiko, bese uthola ukuqonda mayelana ne-ROI yakho yokumaketha.

empty_state.title: Ulungile ukuqala?
empty_state.description: Xhuma imithombo yakho yedatha bese uqala ukwakha imikhankaso yokumaketha enamandla.
